reviews.text:
I came in for dental check-up and ended up doing scaling and a tooth extraction. The staff were very friendly, they sent reminder messages for my appt and shared post treatment advice via WhatsApp.

Dr Maddie was very nice and patient in explaining my oral health condition. I‚Äôve been to other clinics before, but she was the first to properly advise me to remove my wisdom tooth, which could have caused pain and decay, and affected the tooth next to it.

I was kinda scared of the pain from anaesthesia needle and the extraction itself, but surprisingly I didn‚Äôt feel any pain at all, before I knew it, it was done. Highly recommend this clinic for anyone looking for gentle and professional dental treatment.
